title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Alpha5 released - now with Hibernate ORM 6, new Dev UI and more!
content: We are in the process of getting Quarkus 3 ready - with the last alpha, we got our main branch to Jakarta EE 10 to let us getting more things integrated and tested faster. This time we move from Hibernate 5 to Hibernate 6 - which will cause breakages thus...
